Package kademlia

Interface KademliaNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
JKademliaNode
public interface KademliaNode
The main Kademlia Node on the network, this node manages everything for this local system.
Since:
20140523

    • startRefreshOperation

      Schedule the recurring refresh operation

    • stopRefreshOperation

      void stopRefreshOperation()
      Stop the recurring refresh operation

    • getNode

      Node getNode()
      Returns:
      Node The local node for this system

    • getServer

      KadServer getServer()
      Returns:
      The KadServer used to send/receive messages

    • getDHT

      KademliaDHT getDHT()
      Returns:
      The DHT for this kad instance

    • getCurrentConfiguration

      KadConfiguration getCurrentConfiguration()
      Returns:
      The current KadConfiguration object being used

    • bootstrap

      void bootstrap​(Node n) throws java.io.IOException, RoutingException
      Connect to an existing peer-to-peer network.
      Parameters:
      n - The known node in the peer-to-peer network
      Throws:
      RoutingException - If the bootstrap node could not be contacted
      java.io.IOException - If a network error occurred
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - If this object is closed

    • put

      int put​(KadContent content) throws java.io.IOException
      Stores the specified value under the given key This value is stored on K nodes on the network, or all nodes if there are > K total nodes in the network
      Parameters:
      content - The content to put onto the DHT
      Returns:
      Integer How many nodes the content was stored on
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • put

      int put​(JKademliaStorageEntry entry) throws java.io.IOException
      Stores the specified value under the given key This value is stored on K nodes on the network, or all nodes if there are > K total nodes in the network
      Parameters:
      entry - The StorageEntry with the content to put onto the DHT
      Returns:
      Integer How many nodes the content was stored on
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • putLocally

      void putLocally​(KadContent content) throws java.io.IOException
      Store a content on the local node's DHT
      Parameters:
      content - The content to put on the DHT
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • get

      JKademliaStorageEntry get​(GetParameter param) throws java.util.NoSuchElementException, java.io.IOException, ContentNotFoundException
      Get some content stored on the DHT
      Parameters:
      param - The parameters used to search for the content
      Returns:
      DHTContent The content
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      ContentNotFoundException
      java.util.NoSuchElementException

    • refresh

      void refresh() throws java.io.IOException
      Allow the user of the System to call refresh even out of the normal Kad refresh timing
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getOwnerId

      java.lang.String getOwnerId()
      Returns:
      String The ID of the owner of this local network

      int getPort()
      Returns:
      Integer The port on which this kad instance is running

    • shutdown

      void shutdown​(boolean saveState) throws java.io.IOException
      Here we handle properly shutting down the Kademlia instance
      Parameters:
      saveState - Whether to save the application state or not
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
      java.io.IOException
